title: Runner-up at World Cup tournaments by country 1930 to 2014
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of runners-up for 10 number of Countrys.
The Number of runners-up is appeared to be the highest at Country Germany and lowest at Country France.
There is a difference of 3.0 between the maximum Country Germany and minimum Country France.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Number of runners-up in the y axis.
The Number of runners-up is highest at Country Germany and lowest at Country France.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of runners-up for 10 number of Countrys.
The Number of runners-up is appeared to be the highest at Country Germany and lowest at Country France.
There is a difference of 3.0 between the maximum Country Germany and minimum Country France.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of runners-up for 10 number of Countrys.
Country Germany has the highest Number of runners-up and France has the lowest Number of runners-up.
The difference of Number of runners-up between the highest and lowest Country is 3.0.
Number of runners-up at Country Germany is 4.0 , second place is  at 4.0, and thirdly is Argentina at 3.0.
Country Czech Republic, Brazil, Czechoslovakia, Italy, and Hungary share the same value 2.0.
Considered together, the average Number of runners-up in all 10 Countrys is roughly 2.2.
The Number of runners-up is 22.0 if we add up values of all Countrys.
